title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
zora All Endings

You meet Wyll at the front gate of Druid Grove when a fight erupts. After the fight, you can find him inside the grove training with a younger tiefling, Umi, and recruit him. When you interact with Umi, he will be in the middle of training with Wyll. You can interact with Wyll in the middle of their training.

Hey there. Can I have a word? This whelm is hopeless. You're wasting your time. It's good advice, child. You'd do well to listen [DRAGONBORN] Heed the man's words, child.
